title: MM插件伪造插件
author: lihuqiao
txt_content:
MM怪物使用伪造插件之后后台会形成报错，如何解决


稻草人:
  Type: ZOMBIE
  Display: '&7稻草人'
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Player: '&c幻界士兵'
    Skin: AnderXL
  Health: 100
  Damage: 10
  Drops:
  - exp 5 1
  - money 200 1
  - 妖精气息 1-3 0.5
  - 下品玄铁 1 0.5
  Equipment:
  - 稻草人木棍:0
  - 铁头盔:4
  Options:
    Silent: true
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    KnockbackResistance: 1
    PreventItemPickup: true
    FollowRange: 7
    MovementSpeed: 0.2




报错:
[22:51:51] [Server thread/WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #6773 for MythicMobs v4.4.0-SNAPSHOT generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.Disguise.setWatcher(Disguise.java:701) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.setWatcher(PlayerDisguise.java:335) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.clone(PlayerDisguise.java:112) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.clone(PlayerDisguise.java:15) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.DisguiseAPI.disguiseToAll(DisguiseAPI.java:255) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.compatibility.LibsDisguisesSupport$1.run(LibsDisguisesSupport.java:138) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:353) [spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:738) [spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:399) [spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:678) [spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:576) [spigot-1.12..jar:git-Spigot-3fb9445-6e3cec8]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_211]

replies.author: 莫良3
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 莫良3 于 2019-7-8 01:49 编辑 




ProtocolLib .jar
(1.37 MB, 下载次数: 3)



2019-7-8 01:42 上传
点击文件名下载附件









LibsDisguises-1.12.2 PL.jar
(415.25 KB, 下载次数: 10)



2019-7-8 01:42 上传
点击文件名下载附件







mm太大了上传不了：https://www.mythicmobs.net/download/MythicMobs-4.5.9.jar

装1.12.2的最新版插件再试试。

在我的环境下这个怪物生成时没有任何报错
(win10,jdkU211,spigot1.14.3,mythicmobs4.7.0-2856,lib'sdisguisesBuild239,protocolLibGradleBuild9)
